member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.AppendChild
member.summary: Appends an element to the list of children. If the element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the append operation.
member.param: The element to append.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.CreateChild
member.summary: Creates an element from a tag name. The element is appended to the list of children.
member.param: The tag name of the new child. An empty string is interpreted to be a text content element.
The new child element.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the specified type.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a string.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a extend mode value. This method can be used to get the value of a spreadMethod attribute.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a fill mode. This method can be used to get the value of the fill-rule or clip-rule properties.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a matrix value. This method can be used to get the value of a transform or gradientTransform attribute.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a POD type.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The POD type of the value.
The value of the attribute.
The size of the value in bytes.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified POD type.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a string.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The string type.
The value of the attribute.
The number of elements in the returned value.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a display value. This method can be used to get the value of the display property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a length value.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a line cap value. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-linecap property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a line join value. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-linejoin property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as an overflow value. This method can be used to get the value of the overflow property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a preserve aspect ratio value. This method can be used to get the value of a preserveAspectRatio attribute.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a unit type value. This method can be used to get the value of a gradientUnits or clipPathUnits attribute.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a visibility value. This method can be used to get the value of the visibility property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a float.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a paint. This method can be used to get the value of the fill or stroke properties.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as path data. This method can be used to get the value of the d attribute on a path element.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as points. This method can be used to get the value of the points attribute on a polygon or polyline element.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a stroke dash array. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-dasharray property.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValue
member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as an interface type.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The interface ID of the attribute value.
The value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified interface type.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetAttributeValueLength
member.summary: Gets the string length of an attribute of this element.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
The string type of the attribute.
The length of the attribute. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetDocument
member.summary: Gets the document that contains this element.
member.param: Outputs the document that contains this element. This argument will be null if the element has been removed from the tree.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetFirstChild
member.summary: Gets the first child of this element.
member.param: Outputs the first child of this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetLastChild
member.summary: Gets the last child of this element.
member.param: Outputs the last child of this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetNextChild
member.summary: Gets the next sibling of the referenceChild element.
member.param: The referenceChild must be an immediate child of this element.
The output nextChild element will be non-null if the referenceChild has a next sibling. If the referenceChild is the last child, the output is null.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetParent
member.summary: Gets the parent element.
member.param: Outputs the parent element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetPreviousChild
member.summary: Gets the previous sibling of the referenceChild element.
member.param: The referenceChild must be an immediate child of this element.
The output previousChild element will be non-null if the referenceChild has a previous sibling. If the referenceChild is the first child, the output is null.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetSpecifiedAttributeCount
member.summary: Returns the number of specified attributes on this element. Attributes are only considered specified if they are explicitly set on the element or present within an inline style. Properties that receive their value through CSS inheritance are not considered specified. An attribute can become specified if it is set through a method call. It can become unspecified if it is removed via .
member.returns: Returns the number of specified attributes on this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetSpecifiedAttributeName
member.summary: Gets the name of the attribute at the given index.
member.param: The index of the attribute.
Outputs the name of the attribute.
Length of the string returned in the name argument.
Outputs whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetSpecifiedAttributeNameLength
member.summary: Gets the string length of the name of the specified attribute at the given index. The output string length does not include room for the null terminator.
member.param: The index of the attribute.
Outputs the string length of the name of the specified attribute.
Indicates whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetTagName
member.summary: Gets the tag name.
member.param: The tag name.
Length of the value in the name argument.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetTagNameLength
member.summary: Gets the string length of the tag name.
member.returns: Returns the string length of the tag name. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetTextValue
member.summary: Gets the value of a text content element.
member.param: The value of the text content element.
The length of the value in the name argument.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.GetTextValueLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the text content value.
member.returns: Returns the length of the text content value. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.HasChildren
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating whether this element has children.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if this element has children.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.InsertChildBefore
member.summary: Inserts newChild as a child of this element, before the referenceChild element. If the newChild element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the insertion.
member.param: The element to be inserted.

The element that the child should be inserted before. If referenceChild is null, the newChild is placed as the last child. If referenceChild is non-null, it must be an immediate child of this element.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.IsAttributeSpecified
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating if the attribute is explicitly set on the element.
member.param: The name of the attribute.
Outputs whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.
member.returns: TReturns true if the attribute is explicitly set on the element or if it is present within an inline style. Returns FALSE if the attribute is not a valid attribute on this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.IsTextContent
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating whether this element represents text content.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if this element represents text content, e.g. the content of a 'title' or 'desc' element. Text content does not have a tag name.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.RemoveAttribute
member.summary: Removes the attribute from this element. Also removes this attribute from within an inline style if present.
member.param: The name of the attribute to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.RemoveChild
member.summary: Removes the oldChild from the tree. Children of oldChild remain children of oldChild.
member.param: The child element to be removed. The oldChild element must be an immediate child of this element.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.ReplaceChild
member.summary: Replaces the oldChild element with the newChild. This operation removes the oldChild from the tree. If the newChild element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the replace operation.
member.param: The element to be inserted.
The child element to be replaced. The oldChild element must be an immediate child of this element.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element as a color.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element as a matrix value. This method can be used to set the value of a transform or gradientTransform attribute.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element as a length value.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element as an extend mode value. This method can be used to set the value of a spreadMethod attribute.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue

member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element using a POD type.

The POD type of the attribute.
The new value of the attribute.
The size of the new value in bytes.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified type.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element using a string.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The type of the string.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified type.

member.summary: Gets an attribute of this element as a display value. This method can be used to get the value of the display property.

The new value of the attribute.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue
member.summary: Sets an attribute of this element as a unit type value. This method can be used to set the value of a gradientUnits or clipPathUnits attribute.
member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetAttributeValue

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element using an interface.
A given attribute object may only be set on one element in one attribute location at a time.

member.param: Name of the attribute to set.
The new value of the attribute.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified interface type. Returns an error if the attribute object is already set on an element.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement.SetTextValue
member.summary: Sets the value of a text content element.
member.param: The new value of the text content element.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgElement
member.summary: Interface for all SVG elements.
